attributes.action: Abolish car park charges and Wheelclamping in the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I Hereby Petition the Prime Minister, the Government and the population of Great Britain to support our case for the Abolition of Car Park Charges and Wheel clamping in the NHS.
Unfair laws and changes for mercantile profit cause disharmony and misery and have NO PLACE IN A MODERN DEMOCRACY! 
As a suggestion, I would like everybody to ask the canvassers and candidates at the next election to agree; 

"PAYING CAR PARKING AT NHS HOSPITALS CAN COST £50 A WEEK TO VISITING FAMILY AND FRIENDS A COST MOST PEOPLE CAN ILL AFFORD; THERE IS NO MORAL REASON FOR CAR PARKING CHARGES AND WHEELCLAMPING IN THE NHS; IT IS BLATANT EXPLOITATION FOR PROFIT AND MUST BE ABOLISHED". 
Most important, remind the MP's and Councillors that they; 
WILL NOT GET OUR VOTE UNLESS THEY AGREE AND SIGN OUR PETITION .
STOP THIS IMORAL EXPLOITATION

SUPPORT THE ABOLITION OF ALL CAR PARKING CHARGES & WHEELCLAMPING IN THE NHS

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
